info: Rating, 5 stars,  · May 2024,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: It is a wonderful apartment. All those who are planning to visit Dhaka in small group, I highly recommend this place.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · February 2024,  · Stayed about a week
Rating, 5 stars,  · February 2024,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: This place is excellent! I’ve stayed at another place by this host and they’re amazing! Made me feel right at home. Very cooperative and responsive host. The manager (Hridoy) is quite helpful whenever anything is needed. The area is very central (at least for me); great restaurants and shopping places nearby. I will 100% recommend this place.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · January 2024,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: A great place and a great host indeed…

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · January 2024,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: This is not first time I stayed in this place. And this is my fav Airbnb in Dhaka. Location wise this is amazing and everything is close by. Airport is also not that far. Place itself is as described in the listing. Kitchen is well equipped for anyone interested in cooking. Host is very responsive and supportive and I was also allowed to leave my luggage in the morning. Guard is there 24/7 so it’s well secured. The only con I can think of, if you have trouble sleeping, it’s by the road so it’s bit noisy. But that’s the case for entire Dhaka city. But I slept well.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · January 2024,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment: Had a very pleasant stay at this place. No complains watsoever

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · November 2023,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: It was a beautiful stay for 35 days. It felt right at home. The guards, house keeper and caretaker felt like own people. Loved staying at this place.

info: Rating, 3 stars,  · September 2023,  · Stayed a few nights

rating_comment: I stayed at Ashik's Place in Banani for 20 days. The apartment is well-furnished with 2 bedrooms and a workspace. The kitchen had all the promised amenities. Great location near Banani Bazaar and Gulshan2. They provide power backup, a microwave, and even tea, sugar, and coffee sachets. The apartment is well-equipped with tissue wipes, room freshener, and more. The friendly watchman added a personal touch to my stay. Affordable pricing made it even better. I'll definitely return!
